ml_tags: Alexander Lyall James Rice “Ricey” Bridgette,Deacon,Damon & Adrianna Ngiyani ngiima yilaadhu yalagiirray ngiyani gimiyandi gaalanha yilaalu-gi gi (We are here today as we were yesterday and will be forever) 23.06.1993 - 18.11.2021 Our Forever Gomeroi Warrior Ngiyani mgiima yilaadhu yalagiirray ngiyani guniyandi gaalanha yilaali -gi gi ( We are here today as we were yesterday and will be forever ) Precious son & step son of Loving Big brother to Mariah,Ashton,Lacarri,Amanda Jason & Vanessa Melissa & Murphy Loved parter to Nalahni Adored father of Arriah, Adelyn & Xander Forever Cherished Grandson,Nephew,Cousin & Friend
